widgets.title: Widget Showcase
widgets.subtitle: TingOS Component Library
widgets.heading: Retro-Futuristic Widgets
widgets.description: Cold War era aesthetics meet modern web technology. Each widget can be defined in TOSS format for use in cartridges - no GUI required.

geiger.title: Geiger Counter
geiger.description: Authentic radiation detector with clicking audio, analog meter, and CPM readout. Perfect for Cold War era game aesthetics.

nixie.title: Nixie Display
nixie.description: Warm orange glow of nixie tube digits. Stack multiple for counters, clocks, or numeric displays.

magicEye.title: Magic Eye Tube
magicEye.description: Classic tuning indicator with eerie green phosphor glow. Three variants for different visual effects.

tubeArray.title: Vacuum Tube Array
tubeArray.description: Glowing vacuum tubes with animated filaments. Mix triodes, pentodes, and rectifiers for authentic amp aesthetics.

vuMeter.title: VU Meter
vuMeter.description: Analog volume unit meter with bouncing needle, dB scale, and peak LED. Multiple visual styles available.

stereoVu.title: Stereo VU Meters
stereoVu.description: Paired left/right channel meters for stereo audio visualization. Perfect for music players and audio apps.

gaugesComingSoon.title: More Gauges Coming Soon
gaugesComingSoon.description: Pressure gauges, speedometers, altimeters, and more industrial instrumentation.

toss.widgetDefDescription: Each widget is defined as a JSON object within your TOSS cartridge's UI section. Props can be static values or bound to context variables using mustache syntax.
toss.eventBindDescription: Widgets emit events that can trigger FSM transitions or update context. Use the bindings object to wire up interactions.

tooltips.toggleTheme: Switch between Cyberpunk and Victorian themes
tooltips.radiationSlider: Adjust radiation level to see widget response
